key_risks: Revenue volatility and post-pandemic uncertainty due to declining COVID-19 testing demand
Regulatory and compliance risks, including potential delays in product approvals and cybersecurity vulnerabilities
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party suppliers
Intense competition in the diagnostics market, pressuring margins and market share
controversies: Cybersecurity incident disclosed in April 2024, raising concerns about operational vulnerabilities
Challenges in maintaining supply chain and labor force efficiency post-COVID-19
social_issues: Impact of COVID-19 on supply chain and labor force, affecting operational efficiency
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and compliance risks in a highly regulated industry

queries.query: OraSure Technologies Inc revenue volatility post-COVID-19
queries.rationale: Investigate the company's financial stability and sustainability after the pandemic-driven demand for COVID-19 testing products declines.
